channel.description: Recent content in Podcast on Naim's Blog

item.title: AI: The Beast or Jerusalem?
item.description: Here I’ve shared my notes what I’ve taken from AI: The Beast or Jerusalem? video in my own words. It is estimated that human brain can do $10^{18}$ Operations/Second. It could be wrong but it is estimated based on different parameters. Modern CPUs on our phone can do ~$10^{10}$ Operations/Second (10 Billion). And GPUs can do ~$10^{11}$ Operations/Second (100 Billion). Modern AIs like Google or OpenAI are doing $10^{16}$ Operations/Second.
